data.title: Maksim Chmerkovskiy Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Maksim Chmerkovskiy with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Began dancing at age 4

Immigrated to the United States in 1992

Broke his leg in a skiing accident at age 13

Doctors had to place a metal rod in his leg, and told him he might have a limp for the rest of his life

He astounded them by dancing in a competition six months later

Co-founder/Board of Directors member of the non-profit organization Dance Team USA

Best known for appearing on Dancing With the Stars starting in Season 2

Choreographed parts of the aquatic show La RÃªve at Wynn Las Vegas

Owns several dance studios
